atten3.ptxt: Wash off brake fluid immediately if it comes in contact with any painted surface.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BRAKE MASTER CYLINDER SUB-ASSEMBLY (w/o ABS)

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the clutch reservoir tube labeled A from the master cylinder.
Disconnect the brake fluid level warning switch connector labeled B.
Using a union nut wrench, disconnect the 6 brake lines labeled C from the master cylinder and 4-way.
Pull out the master cylinder from the brake booster.
Remove the O-ring from the master cylinder.

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the clutch reservoir tube labeled A from the master cylinder.
Disconnect the brake fluid level warning switch connector labeled B.
Using a union nut wrench, disconnect the 5 brake lines labeled C from the master cylinder and 3-way.
